docs.snippet: The crime wave that marred Puerto Rico's image in recent years appears to have ebbed, with homicides decreasing and both residents and police adopting new measures to track problems and improve public safety....
docs.lead_paragraph: The crime wave that marred Puerto Rico's image in recent years appears to have ebbed, with homicides decreasing and both residents and police adopting new measures to track problems and improve public safety.

headline.main: Amid Its Struggles, Puerto Rico Enjoys Drop in Crime
headline.print_headline: Amid Its Struggles, Puerto Rico Enjoys Drop in Crime

docs.snippet: The Teamsters Union and the Justice Department announced Wednesday they have reached an agreement to end the government's 25-year anti-corruption oversight of the 1.4-million member union....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Teamsters Union and the Justice Department announced Wednesday they have reached an agreement to end the government's 25-year anti-corruption oversight of the 1.4-million member union.

headline.main: Teamsters Union Announces Agreement to End US Oversight
headline.print_headline: Teamsters Union Announces Agreement to End US Oversight

docs.snippet: The FBI is stepping up efforts against international corruption, creating new squads to search for cases of bribery that are rooted overseas but reach to the United States, law enforcement officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The FBI is stepping up efforts against international corruption, creating new squads to search for cases of bribery that are rooted overseas but reach to the United States, law enforcement officials said.

headline.main: FBI Beefs Up Resources Against Foreign Corruption
headline.print_headline: FBI Beefs Up Resources Against Foreign Corruption

docs.snippet: The Queens district attorney, Richard A. Brown, said the office will enhance efforts to prosecute cases of immigrant-related crimes such as financial exploitation....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Queens district attorney, Richard A. Brown, said the office will enhance efforts to prosecute cases of immigrant-related crimes such as financial exploitation.
docs.abstract: Queens Dist Atty Richard A Brown will set up Office of Immigrant Affairs to help immigrants navigate criminal justice system and aid in prosecution of immigrant-related crime; Brown is third district attorney in New York City to open immigrant-specific unit.

headline.main: Queens Prosecutor Creates Office of Immigrant Affairs
headline.print_headline: Queens Prosecutor Creates Immigrant Affairs Office

docs.snippet: Muslims should simply ignore insults to their faith, the Quran says....
docs.lead_paragraph: Muslims should simply ignore insults to their faith, the Quran says.
docs.abstract: Mustafa Akyol Op-Ed article underscores necessity for Muslim leaders to take on traditional understanding of blasphemy in Islam in light of attacks like one in Paris against satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo; points to passage in Quran that tells Muslims to simply ignore insults to their religion.

docs.snippet: How about a million-person march by Muslims for Muslims?...
docs.lead_paragraph: How about a million-person march by Muslims for Muslims?
docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column imagines effect a million-person march demonstrating Muslim world's antipathy toward jihadists would have in curbing acts of extremist violence; notes that ambivalence that both Muslim world feels toward jihadists, and West feels toward Arab regimes that support terrorists, must be forcefully addressed if jihadist zeal is to be effectively countered.

docs.snippet: When everyone seems to mock your faith the pull of extremism is powerful....
docs.lead_paragraph: When everyone seems to mock your faith the pull of extremism is powerful.

headline.seo: The Anger of Europe’s Young Marginalized Muslims

docs.snippet: Pope Francis will be welcomed in this Catholic heartland on Thursday by a Filipino cardinal who might one day succeed him: a boyish-looking priest who rode the bus as a bishop and has impressed many with his intellect, humble life and compassion f...
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis will be welcomed in this Catholic heartland on Thursday by a Filipino cardinal who might one day succeed him: a boyish-looking priest who rode the bus as a bishop and has impressed many with his intellect, humble life and compassion for the poor.

headline.main: Pope's Filipino Host Is a Humble, Rising Church Star
headline.print_headline: Pope's Filipino Host Is a Humble, Rising Church Star

docs.snippet: As a young lawyer, Mr. Bendich argued the two landmark obscenity cases, providing the legal rationales for the judge to find in favor of the defense both times....
docs.lead_paragraph: As a young lawyer, Mr. Bendich argued the two landmark obscenity cases, providing the legal rationales for the judge to find in favor of the defense both times.
docs.abstract: Al Bendich, lawyer who won two landmark obscenity cases involving Allen Ginsberg's and Lenny Bruce's right to free speech, dies at age 85; successfully defended Ginsberg over his 'Howl' book case, and Bruce in his first trial over his nightclub act.

headline.main: Al Bendich, Defender of ‘Howl’ and Lenny Bruce’s Comedy, Is Dead at 85
headline.print_headline: Al Bendich, 85, Dies; Beat-Era Artists’ Lawyer
